document_data.name: Urrusk
document_data.mainbody: '''Urrusk''' was a slaver in [[Waterdeep]] as of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Roughly a decade prior to {{yearlink|1373}}, Urrusk was a slaver, paid to lure destitute people into his hut.
document_data.History: Urrusk had attempted to lure the young orphan [[Narnra Shalace]] to a hut in the Dock Ward about a decade before 1373 DR. Once inside, he tried to molest her, only to be stopped by a second man claiming he was paying Urrusk to lure slaves rather than ruin them. While the second man was struggling with Narnra, Urrusk strangled him with a chain hanging close by. Narnra escaped while they fought.
